Question:
In a straddle split leap, how are the legs positioned? 
A) Asymmetrically to the front and back 
B) Symmetrically to the sides 
C) Both knees are bent 
D) One knee is bent

In the progression of learning the front lever in gymnastics, which variation is considered the easiest? 
A) Advanced tuck front lever 
B) Straddle front lever 
C) Tuck front lever 
D) Full front lever

In the Tin soldier/Teddy bear roll, how does the gymnast initiate the roll? 
A) By standing up and jumping into a roll 
B) By sitting on the floor in a straddle position 
C) By lying on the back and pushing off with the hands 
D) By starting in a handstand and then folding into a roll

Which company is not listed as a manufacturer of balance beams? 
A) AAI 
B) Janssen Fritsen 
C) Acromat 
D) Nike

What is the primary purpose of the roundoff technique in gymnastics? 
A) To increase balance 
B) To turn horizontal speed into vertical speed 
C) To perform a handstand 
D) To improve flexibility
